name: DugCra the Hunt of Truth
description:
DugCra is a 2D labyrinth crawler where you escape pits, kill goblins and search for treasures! Go through over 20 labyrinths to find your ultimate goal - the truth.  And what is the truth? Maybe it's the treasure? Find out yourself!

After reaching the ultimate goal, you can create your own labyrinths with the help of the map maker and share them with your friends!
